resources.string: FaceGlasses is an application that provide the fundamental information about face and suitable glasses
Oval face is a face that has a bit higher cheek bones and a chin that is narrower than the forehead. It is characterized mostly by a softly curved jawline.
Round face is a face that has equal proportion of length and width. It is a type of circular, soft and curvy face.
Heart face is a face that begins with a wide forehead and gradually narrows down to a pointed chin.
Square face is a face that have broad forehead that are wider from side to side and a strong horizontal jawline.
Introduction to the relationship between face shape and type of frame glasses.
On the spot wearing the augmented reality glasses that match your face.
No worry about internet data and wifi.
Pick one from any of these face cards to see its content
Screenshot it if you want to share or save.
"Glasses not made only for the NERDS!"
